name: 王泰典
objective:
1.機率簡介
2.機率分佈
3.統計概論
4.抽樣分析
5.參數估計
6.區間估計
7.假設檢定
8.迴歸分佈
9.統計品管
10.變異分析
schedule:
W01: Introduction to statistics and data analysis
W02~W03: Probability
W04: Random variables and probability distributions
W05: Invited lecture
W06: Mathematical exceptation
W07~W08: Some discrete probability distributions
W09: Some continuous probabilty distributions
W10~W11: Fundamental sampling distributions and data descriptions
W12: One- and two-sample estimation problems
W13~W14: One- and two-sample tests of hypotheses
W15: Simple linear regression and correlation
W16~W17: Multiple linear regression and certain nonlinear regression models
W18: Final
scorePolicy:
作業:70%
考試:20%
課堂表現10%
materials: Walpole, R.E., R. H. Myers, S. L. Myers and K. Ye, 2007, Probability and statistics for engineers and scientists, 8th edition (Pearson international edition), Pearson Education International.
